definition: to put on a hat/to be first/to dub
to compete/competition/match/to surpass/better than/superior to/to excel

sentences.english: The outcome of the soccer final was touch and go for the entire match.
sentences.chinese: 足球冠军赛的胜负，不到最后关头无法定论。

sentences.english: If USC won the game, they would be playing for the national championship.
sentences.chinese: 如果南加州赢了这场比赛，他们就会参加全国冠军赛。

sentences.english: Her best swimming performance was the gold medal on the world championship.
sentences.chinese: 她游泳的最好记录是世界冠军赛的金牌。

sentences.english: He was a member of the University of Chicago championship basketball team in nineteen-oh-nine.
sentences.chinese: 他是1909年芝加哥大学冠军赛篮球队的队员。

sentences.english: In the championship, our school was forced to a tie.
sentences.chinese: 冠军赛中，我们学校的种子选手被对手逼和。

sentences.english: Spain finds its flair to reach WCup final.
sentences.chinese: 西班牙找到他们的优势，挺进世界杯冠军赛。

sentences.english: The record for Burns was broken in the 1996 (nineteen ninety-six) World Championships.
sentences.chinese: 伯恩斯的纪录在1996年的世界冠军赛中被刷新。

sentences.english: While in Tokyo I attended the sumo wrestling world championship.
sentences.chinese: 在日本我去看了世界级相扑冠军赛。

sentences.english: It was the last game of the championships1, and we were all rooting for the Elephants.
sentences.chinese: 那是冠军赛的最后一场，而我们都是帮象队加油的。

sentences.english: She won the LG U.S. National Texting Championship.
sentences.chinese: 她赢得了LG美国国家发短信冠军赛的冠军。

sentences.english: The basket ball competition is exciting.
sentences.chinese: 𠮶次篮球冠军赛真激动人心。

sentences.english: She's going for the double this year, the Olympics and the World Championship .
sentences.chinese: 今年她要争取奥林匹克赛和世界杯冠军赛的双料冠军。
我在这里赢得了一次冠军赛。

sentences.english: Millions of heroes list the last championship, longhua Cheng Feng.
sentences.chinese: 百万英雄榜最后的冠军赛，龙华对战程枫。

sentences.english: A world heavy weight championship match is front news.
sentences.chinese: 寰球重量级冠军赛总是头版头条新闻。

definition: invitation tournament (e.g. between schools or firms)
to compete/competition/match/to surpass/better than/superior to/to excel
